About.title: Identity
About.description1: I am Joseph, a Systems Engineering student at UNAB and a frontend developer with a very personal vision of design. My path began in school, when I was studying electronics and discovered Arduino; that's where I understood that programming made me feel at home. Later I worked with Unity, and from that moment I knew I wanted to dedicate myself to building digital experiences capable of surprising.
About.description2: My style is modern minimalist, with a preference for well-defined components, large borders (rounded-4xl) and clean compositions. However, I also enjoy trying alternative styles loaded with color, visual effects and creative approaches outside the traditional.

stack.title: Main Stack
stack.description: Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, Supabase, Figma, Raycast, Excalidraw

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Software architecture, modern minimalist design, deep attention to detail, creative approach influenced by art and music
